file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/martinus/robin-hood-hashing/master/src/include/robin_hood.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/robin_hood.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/greg7mdp/sparsepp/master/sparsepp/spp.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/spp.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/greg7mdp/sparsepp/master/sparsepp/spp_config.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/spp_config.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/greg7mdp/sparsepp/master/sparsepp/spp_dlalloc.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/spp_dlalloc.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/greg7mdp/sparsepp/master/sparsepp/spp_memory.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/spp_memory.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/greg7mdp/sparsepp/master/sparsepp/spp_smartptr.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/spp_smartptr.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/greg7mdp/sparsepp/master/sparsepp/spp_stdint.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/spp_stdint.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/greg7mdp/sparsepp/master/sparsepp/spp_timer.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/spp_timer.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/greg7mdp/sparsepp/master/sparsepp/spp_traits.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/spp_traits.h)
file(DOWNLOAD https://raw.githubusercontent.com/greg7mdp/sparsepp/master/sparsepp/spp_utils.h ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/spp_utils.h)
